svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
June 15, 2017" date: "2017-06-15"
• Almost exactly a year after the DAO raised 150m, Bancor beat the DAO’s record and then ended their
sale. Emin Gün Sirer is not impressed . Nor is Joey Krug . Ron Bernstein on why Augur’s automated
market makers didn’t work, and Bancor’s response . Reactions worth reading from Fred Wilson and
Almost exactly a year after the DAO raised 150m, Bancor beat the DAO’s record and then ended their
• Emin Gün Sirer is not impressed . Nor is Joey Krug .
Emin Gün Sirer is not impressed . Nor is Joey Krug .
• Ron Bernstein on why Augur’s automated market makers didn’t work, and Bancor’s response .
Ron Bernstein on why Augur’s automated market makers didn’t work, and Bancor’s response .
• Reactions worth reading from Fred Wilson and
Reactions worth reading from Fred Wilson and
• Per Vitalik, we’d be fine with an 8m-13m gas limit ETH Gas Station explores why miners maximize
Per Vitalik, we’d be fine with an 8m-13m gas limit
• ETH Gas Station explores why miners maximize profits with ~4 gwei gasprice
• BlockOneIQ oracle for ThomsonReuters’s data (Reuters coverage in NYTimes )
• Yoichi’s Ethereum Contract Analyzer is re-deployed
• Accept ETH payments on your site using just Parity
• Jordi Baylina: A secure way to make a send
• Reminder : “To save fees either (i) stop making as many contracts, or (ii) use DELEGATECALL
forwarders…watch your SSTOREs like a hawk.”
• Winners of the Status and Token hackathons
• Parity and Datarella in Coindesk for the UN program to give crypto-tracked vouchers to 10k Syrian
• Vitalik throws down a challenge: you can brag about lambos or saving kids’ lives
• SmartPool live for miner testing on the public chain
• CryptoPunks : digital collectables, a la RarePepes
• P2P physical package delivery with PassLfix and Streamr
• FunFair : JezSan’s gaming platform using state channels. Promo video
• OmegaOne : protocol to trade across exchanges for best execution
• Smartex : Ether payment integrations with ecommerce platforms
• NSFW: Spankchain , an adult cam platform
• The Augur Master Plan: democratize and decentralize finance
• Grid+ demo app release and Electricity Markets 102
• All the stuff Brainbot (Raiden) is working on
• Rocket PoS Pool: Widow addresses, deposit tokens and token sales.
• More Token Summit videos: Attention economy and more like the Show and Tell series
• Epicenter interviews Golem’s Alex Leverington & Julian Zawistowski
• The Erik Voorhees media blitz: The Ether Review , The Bitcoin Podcast , Reddit AMA
• FunFair commercial and technical white papers
• VR on the blockchain: Decentraland token sale in August
• William Mougayar: Are token sales to build companies or ecosystems ? and a Guide to Token Usage and
• Vitalik will no longer be an advisor to projects doing token sales (Omise Go and Kyber Network
• Peter VanValkenburgh : “Much as it did in the 1990s for internet infrastructure, Congress should
craft a federal blockchain safe harbor.” I agree !
• Linda Xie: How to get a job in this industry
• Albert Wenger on monetary policy for tokens
• Bloomberg long read to commemorate 1 year since the DAO
• Circle announces USD, GBP, EUR cross-border payments on Ethereum
• Jack Du Rose in VentureBeat: Why Ethereum is Outpacing Bitcoin
You can find this calendar updated daily at TokenSaleCalendar.com
[I aim for a relatively comprehensive list of Ethereum sales, but make no warranty as to even whether
they are legit; as such, I thus likewise warrant nothing about whether any will produce a satisfactory
return. I have passed the CFA exams , but this is not investment advice. If you’re interested in what
I do, you can find my somewhat out-of-date investing thesis and token sale appreciation strategies in
The best compliment you can give this is to share or upvote.
In case you’ve been wondering why this is on WeekinEthereumNews.com instead of blog.status.im, it’s
because Status takes OpSec quite seriously in advance of their token sale.
This newsletter is supported by Status.im . But in case you still want to send Ether (or tokens?):
